text: Caroline Unger (28 October 1803 in Vienna - 23 March 1877 in Florence) was an Austrian singer. She studied music in Italy. Her first scene was in her hometown in 1821. She plays a role in Cosi fan tutte written by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. 3 years later she was singing in the symphony No. 9 of Ludwig van Beethoven. In 1841, she married Fran√ßois Sabatie. She then stopped performing. Category:1803 births Category:1877 deaths Category:Singers from Vienna Category:Contraltos Category:European opera singers
title: Caroline Unger
